movies.title: Marty Supreme
movies.description: Timothée Chalamet shines in A24's critically acclaimed, buzz-generating drama.
movies.overview: Marty Mauser, a young man with a dream no one respects, goes to hell and back in pursuit of greatness.

movies.title: Wake Up Dead Man: A Knives Out Mystery
movies.description: Benoit Blanc returns! This star-studded mystery has everyone talking.
movies.overview: When young priest Jud Duplenticy is sent to assist charismatic firebrand Monsignor Jefferson Wicks, it’s clear that all is not well in the pews. After a sudden and seemingly impossible murder rocks the town, the lack of an obvious suspect prompts local police chief Geraldine Scott to join forces with renowned detective Benoit Blanc to unravel a mystery that defies all logic.

movies.title: Wicked: For Good
movies.description: Global phenomenon! Ariana Grande leads this magical, must-see musical event.
movies.overview: As an angry mob rises against the Wicked Witch, Glinda and Elphaba will need to come together one final time. With their singular friendship now the fulcrum of their futures, they will need to truly see each other, with honesty and empathy, if they are to change themselves, and all of Oz, for good.

movies.title: TRON: Ares
movies.description: Jared Leto enters the grid! Sci-fi fans are buzzing for this sequel.
movies.overview: A highly sophisticated Program called Ares is sent from the digital world into the real world on a dangerous mission, marking humankind's first encounter with A.I. beings.

movies.title: One Battle After Another
movies.description: PTA directs DiCaprio in a masterpiece critics call near-perfect.
movies.overview: Washed-up revolutionary Bob exists in a state of stoned paranoia, surviving off-grid with his spirited, self-reliant daughter, Willa. When his evil nemesis resurfaces after 16 years and she goes missing, the former radical scrambles to find her, father and daughter both battling the consequences of his past.

movies.title: The Smashing Machine
movies.description: The Rock's dramatic turn! Benny Safdie's A24 film has everyone talking.
movies.overview: In the late 1990s, up-and-coming mixed martial artist Mark Kerr aspires to become the greatest fighter in the world. However, he must also battle his opioid dependence and a volatile relationship with his girlfriend Dawn.

movies.title: Zootopia 2
movies.description: The beloved animated sequel is back! A perfect family movie night.
movies.overview: After cracking the biggest case in Zootopia's history, rookie cops Judy Hopps and Nick Wilde find themselves on the twisting trail of a great mystery when Gary De'Snake arrives and turns the animal metropolis upside down. To crack the case, Judy and Nick must go undercover to unexpected new parts of town, where their growing partnership is tested like never before.

movies.title: Hamnet
movies.description: Chloé Zhao directs Paul Mescal in a beautiful, critically acclaimed historical romance.
movies.overview: The powerful story of love and loss that inspired the creation of Shakespeare's timeless masterpiece, Hamlet.

movies.title: The Housemaid
movies.description: Sydney Sweeney sizzles in this recent, twisty mystery thriller.
movies.overview: Trying to escape her past, Millie Calloway accepts a job as a live-in housemaid for the wealthy Nina and Andrew Winchester. But what begins as a dream job quickly unravels into something far more dangerous—a sexy, seductive game of secrets, scandal, and power.

movies.title: Chainsaw Man - The Movie: Reze Arc
movies.description: Anime fans, rejoice! Chainsaw Man movie brings high-octane action and romance.
movies.overview: In a brutal war between devils, hunters, and secret enemies, a mysterious girl named Reze has stepped into Denji's world, and he faces his deadliest battle yet, fueled by love in a world where survival knows no rules.

movies.title: Predator: Badlands
movies.description: Prey director returns! Thrilling, action-packed Predator sequel reignites the franchise.
movies.overview: Cast out from his clan, a young Predator finds an unlikely ally in a damaged android and embarks on a treacherous journey in search of the ultimate adversary.

movies.title: The Running Man
movies.description: Edgar Wright remakes a classic with Glen Powell. Stylish, smart sci-fi action.
movies.overview: Desperate to save his sick daughter, working-class Ben Richards is convinced by The Running Man's charming but ruthless producer to enter the deadly competition game as a last resort. But Ben's defiance, instincts, and grit turn him into an unexpected fan favorite — and a threat to the entire system. As ratings skyrocket, so does the danger, and Ben must outwit not just the Hunters, but a nation addicted to watching him fall.

movies.title: Jay Kelly
movies.description: Noah Baumbach directs Clooney and Sandler. A smart, compelling character study.
movies.overview: Famous movie actor Jay Kelly embarks on a journey of self-discovery, confronting both his past and present, accompanied by his devoted manager, Ron.

movies.title: Dhurandhar
movies.description: Bollywood's action sensation! High-octane thrills, a global fan favorite.
movies.overview: A mysterious traveler slips into the heart of Karachi's underbelly and rises through its ranks with lethal precision, only to tear the notorious ISI-Underworld nexus apart from within.

movies.title: Springsteen: Deliver Me from Nowhere
movies.description: Jeremy Allen White as Springsteen. A captivating music biopic from hot actors.
movies.overview: Bruce Springsteen, a young musician on the cusp of global superstardom, struggles to reconcile the pressures of success with the ghosts of his past.

movies.title: Frankenstein
movies.description: Guillermo del Toro reimagines Frankenstein with an all-star, gothic cast.
movies.overview: Dr. Victor Frankenstein, a brilliant but egotistical scientist, brings a creature to life in a monstrous experiment that ultimately leads to the undoing of both the creator and his tragic creation.

movies.title: The Rip
movies.description: Matt Damon, Ben Affleck, Steven Yeun in a high-stakes action thriller.
movies.overview: Trust frays when a team of Miami cops discovers millions in cash inside a run-down stash house, calling everyone — and everything — into question.

movies.title: The SpongeBob Movie: Search for SquarePants
movies.description: SpongeBob returns! A delightful, animated family adventure that just released.
movies.overview: Desperate to be a big guy, SpongeBob sets out to prove his bravery to Mr. Krabs by following The Flying Dutchman – a mysterious swashbuckling ghost pirate – on a seafaring adventure that takes him to the deepest depths of the deep sea, where no Sponge has gone before.

movies.title: Bugonia
movies.description: Yorgos Lanthimos and Emma Stone re-team for a quirky sci-fi thriller.
movies.overview: Two conspiracy obsessed young men kidnap the high-powered CEO of a major company, convinced that she is an alien intent on destroying planet Earth.

movies.title: Die My Love
movies.description: Lynne Ramsay directs Jennifer Lawrence, Robert Pattinson. An intense, acclaimed drama.
movies.overview: After inheriting a remote Montana house, Jackson moves there from New York with his partner Grace, and the couple soon welcome a child. As Jackson becomes increasingly absent and rural isolation sets in, Grace struggles with loneliness, creative frustration, and unresolved emotional wounds. What begins as an attempt at renewal gradually turns into an intense psychological descent, placing strain on their relationship and exposing the fragile balance between love, identity, and motherhood.

movies.title: If I Had Legs I'd Kick You
movies.description: A24 indie gem with Rose Byrne and Conan O'Brien. Surprisingly witty, unexpected.
movies.overview: With her life crashing down around her, Linda attempts to navigate her child's mysterious illness, her absent husband, a missing person, and an increasingly hostile relationship with her therapist.

movies.title: The Secret Agent
movies.description: Critically acclaimed, recent thriller. Masterful suspense from a renowned director.
movies.overview: Brazil, 1977. Marcelo, a technology expert in his early 40s, is on the run. Hoping to reunite with his son, he travels to Recife during Carnival but soon realizes that the city is not the safe haven he was expecting.
production_companies: Banco Regional de Desenvolvimento do Extremo Sul

movies.title: It Was Just an Accident
movies.description: Powerful, critically adored drama from an acclaimed, uncompromising director. See it now.
movies.overview: An unassuming mechanic is reminded of his time in an Iranian prison when he encounters a man he suspects to be his sadistic jailhouse captor.

movies.title: Sentimental Value
movies.description: Critically acclaimed indie drama with powerful performances. Thought-provoking cinema.
movies.overview: Sisters Nora and Agnes reunite with their estranged father, the charismatic Gustav, a once-renowned director who offers stage actress Nora a role in what he hopes will be his comeback film. When Nora turns it down, she soon discovers he has given her part to an eager young Hollywood star.

movies.title: Good Fortune
movies.description: Keanu Reeves, Aziz Ansari, Seth Rogen in a high-concept comedy. Big laughs.
movies.overview: A well-meaning but rather inept angel named Gabriel meddles in the lives of a struggling gig worker and a wealthy capitalist.

movies.title: Rental Family
movies.description: Brendan Fraser returns in a unique, heartwarming drama. An intriguing concept.
movies.overview: An American actor in Tokyo struggles to find purpose until he lands an unusual gig: working for a Japanese 'rental family' agency, playing stand-in roles for strangers. As he immerses himself in his clients' worlds, he begins to form genuine bonds that blur the lines between performance and reality.

movies.title: A House of Dynamite
movies.description: Kathryn Bigelow directs Idris Elba in a masterful, suspenseful thriller. Intense.
movies.overview: When a single, unattributed missile is launched at the United States, a race begins to determine who is responsible and how to respond.

movies.title: A Very Jonas Christmas Movie
movies.description: Jonas Brothers deliver holiday cheer! A festive, fan-fueled social media event.
movies.overview: Kevin, Nick, and Joe Jonas face a series of escalating obstacles as they struggle to make it from London to New York in time to spend Christmas with their families.

movies.title: Nuremberg
movies.description: Russell Crowe, Rami Malek lead a compelling, thought-provoking historical drama.
movies.overview: In postwar Germany, an American psychiatrist must determine whether Nazi prisoners are fit to go on trial for war crimes, and finds himself in a complex battle of intellect and ethics with Hermann Göring, Hitler's right-hand man.

movies.title: The Wrecking Crew
movies.description: Jason Momoa and Dave Bautista team up for explosive action-comedy fun.
movies.overview: Estranged half-brothers Jonny and James reunite after their father's mysterious death. As they search for the truth, buried secrets reveal a conspiracy threatening to tear their family apart.

movies.title: Five Nights at Freddy's 2
movies.description: The game's back! TikTok obsessed with this fan-favorite horror sequel.
movies.overview: One year since the supernatural nightmare at Freddy Fazbear's Pizza, the stories about what transpired there have been twisted into a campy local legend, inspiring the town's first ever Fazfest. With the truth kept from her, Abby sneaks out to reconnect with Freddy, Bonnie, Chica, and Foxy, setting into motion a terrifying series of events that will reveal dark secrets about the real origin of Freddy's, and unleash a decades-hidden horror.

movies.title: Anaconda
movies.description: Jack Black, Paul Rudd in a wild Anaconda monster-comedy. Unexpectedly hilarious!
movies.overview: A group of friends facing mid-life crises head to the rainforest with the intention of remaking their favorite movie from their youth, only to find themselves in a fight for their lives against natural disasters, giant snakes and violent criminals.

movies.title: Train Dreams
movies.description: A deeply moving, critically acclaimed drama. A quiet, powerful film.
movies.overview: A logger leads a life of quiet grace as he experiences love and loss during an era of monumental change in early 20th-century America.

movies.title: The Long Walk
movies.description: Stephen King adaptation. Tense, gripping sci-fi horror with high stakes.
movies.overview: In a dystopian near-future America, fifty teenage boys take part in a deadly annual walking contest, forced to maintain a minimum pace or be executed, until only one survivor remains.

movies.title: Good Boy
movies.description: Viral horror sensation. This unsettling film is disturbing and truly unique.
movies.overview: A loyal dog moves to a rural family home with his owner Todd, only to discover supernatural forces lurking in the shadows. As dark entities threaten his human companion, the brave pup must fight to protect the one he loves most.

movies.title: The Roses
movies.description: Olivia Colman, Benedict Cumberbatch shine in a sharp, witty comedy-drama.
movies.overview: Life seems easy for picture-perfect couple Ivy and Theo: successful careers, a loving marriage, great kids. But beneath the façade of their supposed ideal life, a storm is brewing – as Theo's career nosedives while Ivy's own ambitions take off, a tinderbox of fierce competition and hidden resentment ignites.

movies.title: Eternity
movies.description: An emotional A24 romance with Elizabeth Olsen, Miles Teller. Intimate and heartfelt.
movies.overview: In an afterlife where souls have one week to decide where to spend eternity, Joan is faced with the impossible choice between the man she spent her life with and her first love, who died young and has waited decades for her to arrive.

movies.title: Left-Handed Girl
movies.description: Critically acclaimed indie drama with a near-perfect Rotten Tomatoes score.
movies.overview: A mother and her two daughters move to Taipei to open a noodle stand at a vibrant night market, but family secrets and tradition test their fresh start.

movies.title: Roofman
movies.description: Channing Tatum, Kirsten Dunst in a fun crime comedy-drama. A clever caper.
movies.overview: A former Army Ranger and struggling father turns to robbing McDonald’s restaurants by cutting holes in their roofs, earning him the nickname "Roofman." After escaping prison, he secretly lives inside a Toys “R” Us for six months, surviving undetected while planning his next move. But when he falls for a divorced mom drawn to his undeniable charm, his double life begins to unravel, setting off a compelling and suspenseful game of cat and mouse as his past closes in.

movies.title: Sisu: Road to Revenge
movies.description: Pure revenge action! High-octane thrills and brutal, relentless action.
movies.overview: Returning to the house where his family was brutally murdered during the war, "the man who refuses to die" dismantles it, loads it on a truck, and is determined to rebuild it somewhere safe in their honor. When the commander who killed his family comes back hellbent on finishing the job, a relentless, eye-popping cross-country chase ensues.

movies.title: The Mastermind
movies.description: Kelly Reichardt's acclaimed crime drama. Masterful, character-driven storytelling.
movies.overview: In a sedate Massachusetts suburb circa 1970, unemployed family man and amateur art thief J.B. Mooney sets out on his first heist. With the museum cased and accomplices recruited, he has an airtight plan. Or so he thinks.

movies.title: In Your Dreams
movies.description: Netflix animated family adventure. Whimsical and fun for all ages.
movies.overview: Stevie and her little brother Elliot journey into the wildly absurd landscape of their own dreams to ask the Sandman to grant them the perfect family.

movies.title: Primate
movies.description: Recent horror thriller. A fresh fright for genre enthusiasts tonight.
movies.overview: Lucy, a college student, along with her friends, spend their vacation at her family's home in Hawaii, which includes her pet chimpanzee, Ben. However, when Ben contracts rabies after being bitten by a rabid animal, the group must fight for their lives in order to avoid the now-violent chimp.

movies.title: The Great Flood
movies.description: Visually stunning Korean sci-fi. A thought-provoking adventure into the unknown.
movies.overview: When a raging flood traps a researcher and her young son, a call to a crucial mission puts their escape — and the future of humanity — on the line.

movies.title: Dust Bunny
movies.description: Mads Mikkelsen, Sigourney Weaver star in a dark, intriguing fantasy thriller.
movies.overview: Ten-year-old Aurora asks her hitman neighbor to kill the monster under her bed that she claims ate her family. To protect her, he must battle an onslaught of assassins while accepting that some monsters are real.

movies.title: Now You See Me: Now You Don't
movies.description: The magic-heist franchise returns. Fun, if familiar, illusionist entertainment.
movies.overview: The original Four Horsemen reunite with a new generation of illusionists to take on powerful diamond heiress Veronika Vanderberg, who leads a criminal empire built on money laundering and trafficking. The new and old magicians must overcome their differences to work together on their most ambitious heist yet.

movies.title: Goodbye June
movies.description: Helen Mirren, Toni Collette star, Kate Winslet directs. A powerful drama.
movies.overview: Four siblings' lives change drastically when their ailing mother takes a turn for the worse over the holiday season.

movies.title: The Rats: A Witcher Tale
movies.description: A dark new chapter in the Witcher universe. For fans of the fantasy series.
movies.overview: To pull off a daring heist, a gang of six misfit outlaws will have to do something they've never done before: trust each other — and a washed-up Witcher.

movies.title: After the Hunt
movies.description: Luca Guadagnino directs Julia Roberts. A compelling, star-studded drama.
movies.overview: A college professor finds herself at a personal and professional crossroads when a star pupil levels an accusation against one of her colleagues, and a dark secret from her own past threatens to come to light.

movies.title: Ballad of a Small Player
movies.description: Colin Farrell, Tilda Swinton lead a poignant, character-driven drama.
movies.overview: Amid the glittering casinos of Macau, a gambler running from his past—and his debts—becomes fascinated by an enigmatic woman at the baccarat table.

movies.title: Oh. What. Fun.
movies.description: Michelle Pfeiffer, Denis Leary in a festive holiday comedy. Pure laughs.
movies.overview: Claire Clauster is the glue that holds her chaotic, lovable family together at the holidays. But this year, after planning a special outing for them, they make a crucial mistake and leave her home alone. Fed up and feeling under appreciated, she sets off on an impromptu adventure of her own. As her family scrambles to find her, Claire discovers the unexpected magic of a Christmas gone off-script.

movies.title: A Merry Little Ex-Mas
movies.description: Alicia Silverstone in a charming holiday rom-com. Lighthearted Christmas cheer.
movies.overview: Recently separated, Kate hopes to celebrate one last perfect family Christmas with her soon-to-be ex-husband Everett and their kids before their divorce is final and the house is sold. But her holiday plans are hilariously derailed when Everett unexpectedly brings his younger, successful new girlfriend.

movies.title: My Secret Santa
movies.description: Another sweet holiday romance. Simple, feel-good festive viewing.
movies.overview: A single mom needs a job. A ski resort needs a Santa. Disguised as a St. Nick lookalike, can Taylor fool a charming hotel heir into ho-ho-hiring her?

movies.title: Jingle Bell Heist
movies.description: Holiday crime-romance. A festive caper with a dash of love.
movies.overview: Two down-on-their-luck hourly workers team up to rob a posh London department store on Christmas Eve. Will they steal each other's hearts along the way?

movies.title: The Family Plan 2
movies.description: Mark Wahlberg action-comedy sequel. Standard, explosive family entertainment.
movies.overview: Now that Dan's assassin days are behind him, all he wants for Christmas is quality time with his kids. But when he learns his daughter has her own plans, he books a family trip to London—putting them all in the crosshairs of an unexpected enemy.

movies.title: Greenland 2: Migration
movies.description: Gerard Butler returns in a high-stakes disaster sequel. Intense action.
movies.overview: Having found the safety of the Greenland bunker after the comet Clarke decimated the Earth, the Garrity family must now risk everything to embark on a perilous journey across the wasteland of Europe to find a new home.

movies.title: People We Meet on Vacation
movies.description: A charming romantic comedy-drama. A feel-good escape for rom-com lovers.
movies.overview: Poppy's a free spirit. Alex loves a plan. After years of summer vacations, these polar-opposite pals wonder if they could be a perfect romantic match.

movies.title: Troll 2
movies.description: Action-fantasy monster movie sequel. Epic battles for genre fans.
movies.overview: When a dangerous new troll unleashes devastation across their homeland, Nora, Andreas and Major Kris embark on their most perilous mission yet.

movies.title: Icefall
movies.description: Joel Kinnaman leads this action thriller. Fast-paced, icy suspense.
movies.overview: A young Indigenous game warden arrests an infamous poacher only to discover that the poacher knows the location of a plane carrying millions of dollars that has crashed in a frozen lake. When a group of criminals and dirty cops are alerted to the poacher’s whereabouts, the warden and the poacher team up to fight back and escape across the treacherous lake before the ice melts.

movies.title: Wildcat
movies.description: Kate Beckinsale in an adrenaline-fueled action thriller. Non-stop excitement.
movies.overview: An ex-black ops team reunite to pull off a desperate heist in order to save the life of their leader’s eight-year-old daughter.
